Plot: After Kelly broke up with Rick, her abusive boyfriend, her friends had a slumber party to cheer her up. As they are telling horror stories, there is a killer in the house coming for them.
Title: Bloody Slumber Party
Writer: Larry Rosen, Brian K. Millard (consulting writer), Larry Rosen
Actors: Melantha Blackthorne, Gloria Chung, Scott Churchson, Elizabeth Claflin
